title: She's Still at it! (In case you wanted a concise explanation!)
Many people missed this!
description: Amber Heard and lawyers complained they were not allowed to tell the Jury about the UK Judgment and complained that the Jury were swayed by social media. However - she TOLD them to research it during the trial!

title: Reaction to Interview
description: In case you missed it - Johnny Depp's excellent team gave interviews after giving it clear thought and here are my thoughts and reactions to their comments.

title: Thank you!
description:
Thank you all so much for your initial and prompt support and sharing this online.

Apologies for those of you experiencing any difficulty signing the petition, clearly the servers have struggled to cope but hopefully, they will pick up!

Please continue to share and I will continue to work tirelessly to fight for justice.

Blackbelt Barrister
